local_peer_id.description: Base58-encoded libp2p peer identifier of the reporting node

peer_count.description: Number of peers currently connected to the reporting node

block_height.description: Current block height reported by the node emitting telemetry

peers.description: Telemetry snapshot for each connected peer

peer.description: Base58-encoded identifier of the remote peer

version.description: Agent or client version reported during the handshake

latency_ms.description: Observed round-trip latency to the peer in milliseconds

last_seen.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when telemetry was last updated

features.description: Feature flags advertised by the observed peer

proof_backends.description: Proof backends reported by the observed peer
